email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

We have a client looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. The laycan is flexible but ideally between Nov 20-25. Can you provide a freight quote under CFR terms?

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Sea Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY for this shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 28.50 per MT under CFR terms. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. Laycan can be adjusted to Nov 22-27 if needed.

Best,
Robert Lee
Cargo Transport Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Robert,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to USD 26.50 per MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Julia,

We can adjust the rate to USD 27.00 per MT, which is competitive given the vessel's performance and availability. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. Let me know if this works for your client.

Best,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Robert,

USD 27.00 per MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan as Nov 22-27 and send the contract details. We will proceed with the shipment.

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Julia,

Confirmed. Laycan is Nov 22-27. I will send the contract details shortly. Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best,
Robert
